name: CryptoTicker
0:
”Alexa, open CryptoTicker.”
”Alexa, ask CryptoTicker what is the price of Ethereum?”
”Alexa, ask CryptoTicker how much does Litecoin cost?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto ticker
des: CryptoTicker makes it easy to monitor your favorite cryptocurrency with a simple question. Ask Alexa what the price of Bitcoin, Ethereum or Litecoin is and she will respond with the most recent price. Using the Coinbase API this skill retrieves the most recent price for any of the three most popular cryptocurrencies. Now you can satisfy your curiosity quickly!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
